package.name: accelerated_vadd
package.description:
A trivial vector-add example (NO ROS USED) that serves as a baseline for development and debugging. The computation sends two integer vectors and adds them.
Vector add operations are offloaded into to the FPGA. The offloading operation into the FPGA (or to the Programmable Logic (PL)).
package.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
